data.title: ExoInt: Devolatilization and interior modeling package for rocky planets
data.name: ExoInt
data.description: Rocky planets as devolatilized stars (Source codes for Wang et al. 2019, MNRAS, doi.org/10.1093/mnras/sty2749). Purpose: devolatilize stellar abundances to produce rocky exoplanetary bulk composition, with which constrain the modelling of the exoplanet interiors.

license.name: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0

evidence: "The codes, named “ExoInt”, are created and maintained by Haiyang S. Wang"

"Purpose: devolatilize stellar abundances to produce rocky exoplanetary bulk composition, which is used togegther with mass/radius information to model the exoplanetary interior structure and mineralogy."
"To run the codes, simply type “idl exoconstraints.pro” ... and the modelling results ... will be automatically stored under the folder “output”."
